alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 2:52AM EST until December 24 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos, Northern Grafton, and Southern Coos Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. Also secure outdoor holiday decorations.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
